name: Arka
description:
Hi all!

Arka it's an arkanoid inspired game where instead of a ball, you control a player and have to destroy all the blocks shooting them while bouncing on a mushroom!

Controls:
  • Menu
    • W & D to change menu option
    • Enter to choose it
  • Level selector
    • A & D to change the level
    • Enter to choose it
  • In game:
    • A & D to move the player
    • Space to jump
    • Right shift to shoot!
    • You can do wallride jumping to a wall while holding the direction key!

Arka has been made on a personal game a week challenge, the purpose of this week was making a game with menus and level selector and put more effort of game feel.

For more information about new weekly games check my twitter! https://twitter.com/Paco_S
